# CreateForwardingNumberDeviceInfo

Forwarding device information. Applicable for 'PhoneLine' type only. Cannot be specified together with 'phoneNumber' parameter

| Name | Type | Required | Description                                       |
| :--- | :--- | :------- | :------------------------------------------------ |
